code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{setLoginUser}from"../redux/loginSlice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LogoutPopup=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=()=>{fetch("https://backend-7ksj.onrender.com/logout",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({user:localStorage.getItem("user")})}).then(response=>{if(response.ok){localStorage.removeItem("user");dispatch(setLoginUser(""));let gotoLogin=()=>navigate("/login");gotoLogin();}else{alert("Logout failed");console.error("Logout failed");}}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error:",error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"popup-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"popup-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Are you sure you want to logout?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Confirm"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{navigate(-1);},children:"Cancel"})]})});};export default LogoutPopup;
